title: Perfect Female Secondary School Enrollment
description: In 2017, Canada achieved a perfect 100% net enrollment rate for females in secondary education, indicating full participation of eligible female students.

title: High UHC Service Coverage Index
description: As of 2021, Canada had a UHC service coverage index of 91, reflecting a high level of access to essential health services for its population.

title: Significant Portfolio Equity Net Outflows
description: In 2023, Canada experienced significant net outflows in portfolio equity, amounting to -35.8 billion USD, indicating a substantial movement of investment capital out of the country.
